sen.j: 天明屋尚（てんみょうや ひさし）は、レコード会社のアートディレクターを経たのちに美術家として活動している作家。
sen.e: Hisashi TENMYOUYA is active as an artist, after working as an art director at a record company.
Hisashi TENMYOUYA is active as an artist, after working as an art director at a record company.
Hisashi TENMYOUYA is active as an artist, after working as an art director at a record company.

sen.j: 権威主義的な美術体制に対して、絵で闘うことを宣言し武闘派を旗揚げ。
sen.e: He declared to fight against the authoritarian community of artists with his paintings and launched the Butoha faction.
He declared to fight against the authoritarian community of artists with his paintings and launched the Butoha faction.
He declared to fight against the authoritarian community of artists with his paintings and launched the Butoha faction.

sen.j: 「画聖」雪舟、「画狂」葛飾北斎、「画鬼」河鍋暁斎に続くべく、自ら「画強」と名乗る。
sen.e: With the intention of following 'Gasei' Sesshu, 'Gakyo' Hokusai KATSUSHIKA, and 'Gaki' Kyosai KAWANABE, he called himself 'Gakyo.'

With the intention of following 'Gasei (painting saint)' Sesshu, 'Gakyo (painting lunatic)' Hokusai KATSUSHIKA, and 'Gaki (painting demon)' Kyosai KAWANABE, he called himself 'Gakyo (painting strength).'
sen.cmt: カッコ内に説明を補足
sen.e: With the intention of following 'Gasei (painting saint)' Sesshu, 'Gakyo (painting lunatic)' Hokusai KATSUSHIKA, and 'Gaki (painting demon)' Kyosai KAWANABE, he called himself 'Gakyo (painting strength).'

sen.j: 絵画、雑誌、新聞挿画、ポスターなど多様な形態で発表する「平成の絵師」。
sen.e: He is 'the painter in the Heisei era,' producing his art in various forms like painting, magazine, newspaper illustration, and poster.
He is 'the painter in the Heisei era,' producing his art in various forms like painting, magazine, newspaper illustration, and poster.
He is 'the painter in the Heisei era,' producing his art in various forms like painting, magazine, newspaper illustration, and poster.

sen.j: 2006年サッカーＷ杯ドイツ大会FIFAワールドカップ公式アートポスターでは、14人の中に唯一日本人作家として選出された。
sen.e: He was the only Japanese artist selected as 14 artists for creating the Official Art Poster 2006 FIFA World Cup Germany.
He was the only Japanese artist selected as one of the 14 artists for creating the Official Art Poster 2006 FIFA World Cup Germany.
sen.cmt: as 14 artists → as one of the 14 artists
sen.e: He was the only Japanese artist selected as one of the 14 artists for creating the Official Art Poster 2006 FIFA World Cup Germany.

sen.j: またニューヨーク・タイムス紙の一面を飾るなど、作品は海外でも高く評価されている。
sen.e: His works have been so highly appreciated that his art was reviewed on the front page of the New York Times.
His works have been so highly appreciated that his art was reviewed on the front page of the New York Times.
His works have been so highly appreciated that his art was reviewed on the front page of the New York Times.
